alert.note: Alert for Bath; Fleming; Montgomery; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 6:44PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Montgomery, Bath, Fleming and Rowan Counties through 715 PM EDT... At 644 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Foxport to Ringos Mills to Hope. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Sharkey, Foxport, Plummers Landing and Ramey around 650 PM EDT. Hilda and Muses Mills around 655 PM EDT. Cranston, Hays Crossing, Munson and Waltz around 700 PM EDT. Morehead, Triplett, Rodburn, Midland, Christy and Farmers around 705 PM EDT. Yale, Gates, Freestone and Bluestone around 710 PM EDT. Zilpo, Bangor, Cogswell, Lick Fork, Pelfrey, Brandy, Clearfield and Crix around 715 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Lakeview Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for east central Kentucky.
